# isNull

> Test if a value is null.

<!-- <usage> -->

## Usage

``` javascript
var isNull = require( '@stdlib/utils/is-null' );
```

#### isNull( value )

Tests if a `value` is `null`.

``` javascript
var bool = isNull( null );
// returns true
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->

## Examples


``` javascript
var isNull = require( '@stdlib/utils/is-null' );

console.log( isNull( null ) );
// returns true

console.log( isNull( undefined ) );
// returns false
```

<!-- </examples> -->
